/* CategoryBoardMapper.getCategoryList */
SELECT A.CATEGORY_NAME, A.CATEGORY_NO FROM TB_CATEGORY A LEFT OUTER JOIN TB_CATEGORY_USER B ON B.CATEGORY_NO = A.CATEGORY_NO WHERE B.ESNTL_ID = #{esntlId} AND A.DELETE_AT = 'N'

/* CategoryBoardMapper.getCategoryName */
SELECT A.CATEGORY_NO, A.CATEGORY_NAME, A.FRST_REGIST_PNTTM, B.NAME, B.ESNTL_ID FROM TB_CATEGORY A LEFT OUTER JOIN TB_MEMBER B ON B.ESNTL_ID = A.FRST_REGISTER_ID WHERE CATEGORY_NO = #{categoryNo} AND A.DELETE_AT = 'N'
